Loving the models. Maybe not the inflatable tubes tho(maybe drop the crushed aluminum textures and just use plain grey textures). Otherwise they look great

Very nice Bobcat will you be having a the same sort of Home modules as before like a power plant a recon unit and a habitat if you are can i put a request in for the big solar panel that was in the original home unit it was awesome

Maybe not the inflatable tubes tho(maybe drop the crushed aluminum textures and just use plain grey textures). Otherwise they look great

I wonder, b9 has some cross-fading textures during animation for turning on and off the interior lighting etc, I wonder if the same trick is usable to transition from wrinkly to smooth texture on inflatable stuff?
That's really nice, especially the RasterProp monitors.
Holy sweet baby jesus. Bobcat, I cant wait to colonize the kerbal system with your sweet sweet modules, you make planetary colonization sexy.
I'd just like to say this looks epic. Realistic enough to intergate with real-world rockets and futuristic enough to do some amazing stuff. I love the pop-out tunnels and hab modules. Very creative!

Also orbital module interior

Edited January 6, 2014 by BobCat
Looking Good BobCat!!! Can't wait!!!!
I see lots of hours and hard work put into those Bobcat!! Its looking really good!
Orbital ship almost ready
Your modelling and texture skills have improved a lot over the passed year and a halfÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ This is amazing!

Wow! Every new pic just gets better and better! The new H.O.M.E. system looks like it will have a lot of cool animations and useful features. This will definitely be an 'insta-download' when released. I don't care how much memory it uses (but hopefully not too much, lol), I'll get rid of a lot of other mods if I have to in order to use these fantastic parts.

Keep up the awesome work, BobCat!

Loving the models. Maybe not the inflatable tubes tho(maybe drop the crushed aluminum textures and just use plain grey textures). Otherwise they look great

Naw, I think they look fine. It's probably pretty difficult to get a good looking 'crinkled silver Mylar' texture in this game anyway, as I understand it reflective surfaces don't play nice in Unity. Or something.

Anyway, BobCat, as I've said, I think everything in this pack is looking awesome so far! However, I too would like to state my hopes for having an updated 'recon'-style module, something to carry one of your (hopefully also updated) small DEMV rovers. I'm finding it quite difficult to effectively transport a rover to another planet in a protected fashion, and the old recon module was great for that. Just my 2 cents.

Carry on, sir, looking forward to your next release, even if it's just more pictures, lol.
Edited January 7, 2014 by BobCat
